$interpreted: Karnulla: Hah~ Huff~ Those damn humans, how dare they embarrass me like that...
Hestia: You!? What do you want coming here again...
Hestia: Ah, are you injured?
Hestia: And who are you folks?
Karnulla: If you're not helping, then leave me alone!
Hestia: What exactly is going on now? Where did these exotic species come from?
Karnulla: They were brought here by a group of humans...
Hestia: Humans?
Platypus: Kekekekekek!
Hestia: What? All the Platypuses are captured!? Who did it?
Platypus: Keke, Kekekek!
Hestia: Humans?
Karnulla: Looks like it's the same group of humans that captured the boys.
Hestia: That pack of little frogodiles was captured as well? What's the point of capturing so many animals? Are they going to eat all of them?
Karnulla: They're not going to eat them, but sell them.
Hestia: Sell?
Karnulla: People die for wealth and birds die for food.
Hestia: What are you talking about?
Karnulla: This is something Yan-Bo used to say.
Hestia: No wonder I can't understand it. What does it mean?
Karnulla: It means, that humans have a desire what they call "wealth".
Karnulla: Some people, in order to fulfill this desire, will do things that hurt the environment and, in some cases, the lives of others.
Hestia: I remember it now. I was kidnapped to Maple Lake in the first place because some human wanted to sell me as well...
Platypus: Keke...
Hestia: Frogodiles hurting the lives of others just because they are hungry is already terrible enough.
Karnulla: Hey, that's part of our species' nature. What's so terrible about that!?
Hestia: Never imagined that these people would be even more wretched than frogodiles, doing such things for selfish desires...
Hestia: Unforgivable!! I'm going to barge in and rescue all the Platypuses!
Karnulla: You won't stand any chance if you go in yourself!
Hestia: What did you say?
Karnulla: Say, how about we work together temporarily on this occasion?
Hestia: Work together?
Karnulla: Those humans brought a lot of comrades. Dealing with them won't be easy.

Karnulla: I need to save my boys. You also need to save those food supplies. Therefore, it's better for both of us if we act together.
This way, we'll have a chance to take down those humans.
Hestia: Can you promise that you won't cause any trouble?
Karnulla: I promise that before we take down the humans, I will not attack you and those food supplies...
Hestia: Food?
Karnulla: Okay, okay, Platypuses. Happy now?
Hestia: Since you made a promise, I will work together with you this one time!

Model.Text: Hah~ Huff~ Those damn humans, how dare they embarrass me like that...
You!? What do you want coming here again...
Ah, are you injured?
And who are you folks?
If you're not helping, then leave me alone!
What exactly is going on now? Where did these exotic species come from?
They were brought here by a group of humans...
Humans?
Kekekekekek!
What? All the Platypuses are captured!? Who did it?
Keke, Kekekek!
Humans?
Looks like it's the same group of humans that captured the boys.
That pack of little frogodiles was captured as well? What's the point of capturing so many animals? Are they going to eat all of them?
They're not going to eat them, but sell them.
Sell?
People die for wealth and birds die for food.
What are you talking about?
This is something Yan-Bo used to say.
No wonder I can't understand it. What does it mean?
It means, that humans have a desire what they call "wealth".
Some people, in order to fulfill this desire, will do things that hurt the environment and, in some cases, the lives of others.
I remember it now. I was kidnapped to Maple Lake in the first place because some human wanted to sell me as well...
Keke...
Frogodiles hurting the lives of others just because they are hungry is already terrible enough.
Hey, that's part of our species' nature. What's so terrible about that!?
Never imagined that these people would be even more wretched than frogodiles, doing such things for selfish desires...
Unforgivable!! I'm going to barge in and rescue all the Platypuses!
You won't stand any chance if you go in yourself!
What did you say?
Say, how about we work together temporarily on this occasion?
Work together?
Those humans brought a lot of comrades. Dealing with them won't be easy.

I need to save my boys. You also need to save those food supplies. Therefore, it's better for both of us if we act together.
This way, we'll have a chance to take down those humans.
Can you promise that you won't cause any trouble?
I promise that before we take down the humans, I will not attack you and those food supplies...
Food?
Okay, okay, Platypuses. Happy now?
Since you made a promise, I will work together with you this one time!
